publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2381 Ms Margo MacDonald: Holyrood Projectâ€”That the Parliament thanks the Holyrood Progress Group for its efforts to date; sympathises with its difficulties in adequately monitoring and reporting on the costs, progress and management of the Holyrood Project, and directs the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to disband the Progress Group in order to substitute a more satisfactory and professional method of controlling the Project. Supported by: Alex Neil*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2381 Holyrood Project (lodged on 30 October 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
